title: CHEMICAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes in Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other subject from either Biology, Agricultural Science, Technical Drawing, Further Mathematics, Geography, Economics, Dying & Bleaching or Leather Goods Manufacturing.

title: CHEMISTRY
de_requirements: Two 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) of Physics, Mathematics or Biology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and any other subject from Biology/Agricultural Science, Computer Studies, Cosmetology and Dying & Bleaching

title: CIVIL ENGINEERING
de_requirements: (i)       'A' Level passes in Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other subject from Biology, Agricultural Science, Technical Drawing, Further Mathematics, Geography, Economics, Data Processing

title: COMPUTER ENGINEERING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes in Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other subject from Biology, Agricultural Science, Technical Drawing, Further Mathematics, Geography, Economics, Computer Studies, Data Processing/GSM Maintenance

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other two subject from Computer Studies, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science or Data Processing/GSM Maintenance.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and any other from Chemistry, Biology or Agricultural Science.

utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry, and  Physics or a pass in Physics and a credit pass in Geography, Computer Studies, Agricultural Science, Health Education, Fisheries or Tourism
